{"agentExecutionMode":"auto","isPanelCollapsed":true,"displayedAnnouncements":[],"conversations":{"650730df-1e16-4993-9e3a-7290b1ff65cc":{"id":"650730df-1e16-4993-9e3a-7290b1ff65cc","createdAtIso":"2025-11-30T14:58:27.493Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2025-11-30T15:00:32.103Z","chatHistory":[{"request_id":"05c38c5c-0c7d-48e0-a163-ba5047cdd701","uuid":"9dbd58d9-ebf6-4bca-9898-5e8e465da1a8","chatItemType":"agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","status":"success","fromTimestamp":0,"toTimestamp":1764514707506},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"f504a89b-bd0c-4216-ad84-2dced8a8d9de","timestamp":"2025-11-30T14:59:03.150Z","request_message":"I need help coordinating frontend and backend debugging for this AI teaching assistant application. Please help me with the following:

1. Set up the development environment to run both frontend and backend simultaneously
2. Identify the current API endpoints and their connection points between frontend and backend
3. Configure proper CORS settings and API base URLs for local development
4. Set up debugging tools or configurations (such as browser DevTools, network inspection, or debugging proxies) to monitor requests and responses between frontend and backend
5. Verify that the frontend can successfully communicate with the backend API
6. Help troubleshoot any connection issues, authentication problems, or data format mismatches between the two services

Please start by examining the current configuration files (such as environment variables, API configuration, or proxy settings) to understand how the frontend connects to the backend, and suggest the best approach for coordinated
